SEARCH
Module BrickBreaker
Package breakout.core.screens

Class ArenaScreen

java.lang.Object
breakout.core.screens.Screen
breakout.core.screens.ArenaScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
DependenciesInjectable, DefaultDependenciesInjectable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArenaScreen
public abstract class ArenaScreen extends Screen implements DependenciesInjectable
Represents the main gameplay screen in the Breakout game. This class manages the entire game arena, including player entities, enemy bricks, collectibles, and projectiles. It is responsible for initializing the game state, managing game loops, rendering the game, and handling user inputs.

  • Field Summary
